My Work

Check it out

Finished Project

Radiographic Film Scanner as Diagnosis Support Systems for Chest X-Rays

Technology Used:

Image Recognition Machine Learning


The main objective of this project is to create an expert system forming an alternative method for diagnosing tuberculosis, in accordance with engineering standards. This is a machine that utilizes the camera of raspberry pi3 to capture the image of analog chest x-ray and our system will process and analyze the captured image then classify it to Pulmonary Tuberculosis, Secondary Tuberculosis or negative.
